jd: From: vivek pandey, tek inspirations vivek.pandey@tekinspirations.com Reply to: vivek.pandey@tekinspirations.com Need DL and Visa Copy at time of Submission along with Active LinkedIn Profile as it is Required.EC- Auto ClubTitle- Collibra Project manager Duration- 6+ MonthsLocation- RemoteMOI: Skype Visa: USC, GC, GC-EAD, H4-EADJob Description: Project Manager must have excellent project management skills (providing status trackers, metrics, ppt. updates to executives). In addition, need Tableau Development experience as a really nice-to-have since Collibra’s OOTB reporting don’t meet company execs’ standards. Vivek PandeyTechnical RecruiterEmail: vivek.pandey@tekinspirations.com | TEK Inspirations LLC : 13573 Tabasco Cat Trail, Frisco, TX 75035Disclaimer: If you are not interested in receiving our e-mails then please reply with a "REMOVE" in the subject line to remove@tekinspirations.com. And mention all the e-mail addresses to be removed with any e-mail addresses, which might be diverting the e-mails to you. We are sorry for the inconvenience
